## utils.style.getCascadedStyle() function

Gets the cascaded style value of a node, or null if the value cannot be computed (only Internet Explorer can do this).

Copied from Closure's goog.style.getCascadedStyle

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function getCascadedStyle(element: Element, style: string): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  element | Element | Element to get style of. |
|  style | string | Property to get (camel-case).  Style value.  Blockly.utils.style.getCascadedStyle |

<b>Returns:</b>

string
